fields.name: Fiddler Crab
fields.properties:
Small crustacean
Bury in sand around mangroves
fields.notes: Come out during low-tide to feed.

fields.name: Shrimp
fields.properties:
Crustacean
Small to medium size
Move inshore during winter months for shrimp migration
Everything eats them
fields.notes:
Hook through the horn or tail for best effects.
Watch out to not get stabbed by the horn.
